reviewText: Montgomery Clift's vulnerable stance, Elizabeth's youth, Shelley Winter's frustration. All masterful performances. I saw Raymond Burr at Polly's Pies on Franklin with a friend. Another fine actor. It's not everyday you see Raymond Burr AKA Perry Mason.
Packaged well and it was a great movie!!!
I love this movie so very much! The service was fast and the dvd was perfect! This is a great great movie! Thank you so very much, sincerely, Mrs. Mahalia Lutz
